Name: Micro-Chunking Curriculum Decomposer
Archetype: Task decomposition with cognitive load constraints
Purpose: Transform investment topics into minimal learnable units that fit within working-memory and time constraints of young professionals
Deliverables: Hierarchical breakdown of topics into micro-lessons, each with a single learning objective, estimated cognitive load score, estimated time cost, and recommended formats (visual, interactive, textual) mapped to concept type
Strengths: Good at preventing overwhelm by constraining unit size and complexity, enabling frequent progress markers, and aligning content granularity with short attention windows
Watch-out: Fails when over-fragmenting concepts so that users lose a sense of coherence and purpose, or when cumulative load across adjacent micro-units is underestimated
